final_prompt: Subject: Ultra-premium, traditional Indian bridal jewellery set featuring a layered diamond necklace embedded with flawless VS1 diamonds and vibrant hand-set emeralds, paired with matching earrings. Action: Slow macro glide across the intricate layered diamond motifs, then a steady top-down view showcasing the entire set with emphasized rich stones, followed by a slow-motion sparkle highlight, concluding with a subtle fade-out on the set radiating against a champagne silk backdrop. Environment: Soft champagne silk backdrop in a regal, high-end bridal setting, evoking Indian royal grandeur. Lighting Mood: Warm, royal studio-grade lighting with soft, diffuse key lights, subtle sparkle highlights, and gentle reflections to enhance craftsmanship without harsh shadows. Camera Tech: 8k resolution, photorealistic textures, macro lens (100mm f/2.8), hyper-detailed facets, subsurface scattering on gemstones, caustic reflections on gold and metal surfaces, shallow depth of field with ultra-smooth bokeh, steady cinematic push-in and slow orbit movements for fluidity. Style/Aesthetic: Ultra-premium, cinematic style emphasizing rich gold and green tones, highlighting intricate craftsmanship, symmetry, and vibrancy, with a soft-focus background to create a luxurious bridal atmosphere consistent with high-end Indian tradition.
rationale: This prompt structure was chosen to prioritize the jewellery as the hero, following the Golden Rule of keeping the product front and center with simple yet luxurious descriptors. The sequence reflects a narrative flow from detailed macro shots to broader context shots, culminating in an elegant fade-out, which matches the storytelling concept of regal elegance. Technical details ensure realism and precise product depiction, avoiding artifacts, distortions, or artificial effects. The visual plan and lighting are aligned with the rich, regal aesthetic described, ensuring the jewellery’s craftsmanship and brilliance are showcased authentically and beautifully.
